original_text: And he shall stir up his power and his heart against the king of the south with a great army. And the king of the south shall wage war with an exceedingly great and mighty army, but he shall not stand, for plots shall be devised against him.
korean_text: 그가 그의 힘을 떨치며 용기를 다하여 큰 군대를 거느리고 남방 왕을 칠 것이요 남방 왕도 심히 크고 강한 군대를 거느리고 맞아 싸울 것이나 능히 당하지 못하리니 이는 그들이 계략을 세워 그를 침이니라

sentences.original_text: And he shall stir up his power and his heart
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 권능과 마음을 일으킬 것이며

sentences.original_text: against the king of the south
And the king of the south shall wage war
with an exceedingly great and mighty army,
for plots shall be devised against him.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그를 대적하여 꾀며 꾸며진 계략이 있기 때문이라
